info.name: Fallen London - Hunter's Keep Run
info.description:
Gives options worth the most echos an orange button. Does not include the arrival.

This is no longer one of the best money grinds in Fallen London; the well chances got nerfed quite a bit.

This style works with the June 2018 redesign.

style.css:
@-moz-document domain("fallenlondon.com")
{
   div[data-branch-id="18814"] .button--primary, /* Talk to Lucy */
   div[data-branch-id="8351"] .button--primary, /* Ask her to take a stroll with you */
   div[data-branch-id="18849"] .button--primary, /* Examine the books */
   div[data-branch-id="8380"] .button--primary, /* Look for something significant */
   div[data-branch-id="19031"] .button--primary, /* Take your net to the well */
   div[data-branch-id="8444"] .button--primary, /* Trust Cynthia's advice */
   div[data-branch-id="18850"] .button--primary,
   div[data-branch-id="8381"] .button--primary, /* The three Graces? */
   div[data-branch-id="8423"] .button--primary, /* The Furies? */
   div[data-branch-id="8424"] .button--primary,  /* The faces of Hecate? */
   div[data-branch-id="18857"] .button--primary, /* Lucy finishes her story */
   div[data-branch-id="18854"] .button--primary, /* Cynthia finishes her story */
   div[data-branch-id="18851"] .button--primary, /* Phoebe finishes her story */
   div[data-branch-id="8366"] .button--primary  /* Join the sisters in the herb-garden */
   {
     background: #db8e00 !important;
   }
}
